::Zardus::

Zardus nods. "There is."

Something was tugging at the back of his mind, but he couldn't quite remember. That ship had indeed landed there, but a long time ago, in the beginnings of the Neo Beast Wars.

"We'll check it out," he says, manuevering the shuttle to land.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Wheeljack/Hurricane:::
> 
> Wheeljack: Can't say i can recall a ship landing here.
> Hurricane: I don't think ive heard of anything crashing here.
> Wheeljack: Why Zardus, IS there something here?
